original_text: The FDA issued a Final Rule to Amend the MQSA Regulations (“2023 MQSA Final Rule”) on March 10, 2023. Facilities subject to the MQSA and its implementing regulations must comply with all the requireme...

qa_pairs.text_input: What is the purpose of a mammogram?
qa_pairs.output: A mammogram is a safe, low-dose X-ray picture of the breast used to detect breast cancer in its earliest stages.

qa_pairs.text_input: When should patients get a screening mammogram?
qa_pairs.output: Patients should get a screening mammogram when they have no symptoms of breast cancer, typically starting at age 40.

qa_pairs.text_input: How do patients get their mammogram results?
qa_pairs.output: Mammography facilities must provide each patient with a written summary of the exam results, either handed to them at the time of the exam, provided electronically, or mailed within 30 days.
